fields.name: Credit note related to goods or services
fields.description: Document message used to provide credit information related to a transaction for goods or services to the relevant party.

fields.name: Credit note related to financial adjustments
fields.description: Document message for providing credit information related to financial adjustments to the relevant party, e.g., bonuses.

fields.name: Credit note
fields.description: (1113) Document/message for providing credit information to the relevant party.

fields.name: Factored credit note
fields.description: Credit note related to assigned invoice(s).

fields.name: Forwarder's credit note
fields.description: Document/message for providing credit information to the relevant party.
